Name: LVN Fake News
About the game: Nadiya is a new student at LVN University. It has always been her dream to be a video game developer, but when she shows up to her first day of school she finds out that she has accidentally been enrolled in the news program. Not sure what to do, Nadiya tries her best to fit into LVN News. Soon Nadiya discovers that LVN News isn't what it appears to be on the surface. Her classmates are keeping a deep secret about the true purpose of the program. LVN Fake News is a kinetic visual novel with a heavy emphasis on the yuri genre. The game is light and has a humorous tone. To get the all content, please download the free DLC.
